description:
Unaware of each other`s identities, Date and Chosokabe clash! Meanwhile, Mori plots to further his own agenda while playing ally to Toyotomi - but Toyotomi and Takenaka have plans of their own.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dragon and Ogre: Clash and Roar in Owari! The Combined Force of Date and Chosokabe
Ryuu to Oni: Owari no Gekitotsu! Bakusou! Date-Chousokabe Rengougun!!
竜と鬼 尾張の激突! 爆走!伊達・長曾我部連合軍!!
